document.full_text: a japanese government panel on thursday recommended doubling the country's sales tax in stages over the next four years to help pay for rising social security costs, though prime minister naoto kan's looming resignation and instability in his ruling party cast doubt over whether the policy will be implemented.
document.title: japan panel: need to double sales tax by 2015 for welfare
lines_and_colors: a japanese government panel on thursday recommended doubling the country's sales tax in stages over the next four years to help pay for rising social security costs, though prime minister naoto kan's looming resignation and instability in his ruling party cast doubt over whether the policy will be implemented.
